thread.title: Sleater-Kinney Announce First-Ever Live Album Live In Paris
thread.title_full: Sleater-Kinney Announce First-Ever Live Album Live In Paris

author: James Rettig
title: Sleater-Kinney Announce First-Ever Live Album Live In Paris
text:
James Rettig @jmret | 10:17 am Share < br />this article: 
Sleater-Kinney are a legendary live band, and they have announced that their first-ever live album will be out at the end of the month. Live In Paris was recorded at the trio’s performance at La Cigale on 3/20/15 during the European leg of their tour for their comeback album, No Cities To Love . The album will be released on 1/27, and you can hear them perform “Surface Envy” from the set below. 
Tracklist:
